title: Mushroom and goat's cheese tart
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons ice cold water', '1/2 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 egg', '250g plain flour', '125g butter or margarine', '1 onion, finely sliced', '100g button mushrooms, sliced', "100g goat's cheese, crumbled", '1/4 teaspoon caraway seeds', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '150g fontina cheese, sliced thinly']
